function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of standardized testing for intercomparisons of monitoring data","Impact":"Difficulty in comparing and analyzing monitoring data across different levels","Mitigation":"Implement standardized testing protocols to ensure consistency and comparability of data","Technologies":"Data management and analysis software for standardized testing","People":"Public health experts, researchers, and data analysts","Owner":"Public health organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Geographically fragmented data collection and reporting system","Impact":"Inefficient and inconsistent data collection and reporting, leading to challenges in disease surveillance","Mitigation":"Centralize data collection and reporting systems to ensure consistency and accuracy","Technologies":"Geospatial data management systems and reporting software","People":"Wastewater treatment operators, environmental engineers, and data analysts","Owner":"Environmental and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Rapid growth in WBE for monitoring infectious disease","Impact":"Potential overload of data and information, leading to challenges in data management and analysis","Mitigation":"Develop scalable data management and analysis tools to handle the rapid growth of WBE data","Technologies":"Big data analytics platforms and machine learning algorithms","People":"Data scientists, researchers, and public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions and technology companies"}]}
